text: Dr Priyanka Reddy raped &amp brutally burnt in Telangana Police arrested Naveen Muhammad Pasha Keshavulu Shiva Was her scooty deliberately punctured? When someone calls India unsafe for girls we react a lot to it But when such cases happen Judiciary needs to act fast.
